citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30-1:00pm on
12-APR-22. No answer was received within 30 minutes to knocks at door, phone call and voicemail left at listed number.
End Section
